entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind light except west 50 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind light except west 60 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
